headline: Klarna’s $14 Billion Valuation Draws Out FinTech Bargain Hunters
summary: Part of the appeal: the buy-now-pay-later lender’s implied market valuation is currently about a 50% discount to rival Affirm Holdings Inc.  The payments company from Sweden’s offering of 34.3 million shares — with more than 80% being sold by early backers — has drawn at least eight times the orders above what’s available, Bloomberg has reported.  The robust demand has prompted the banking syndicate to guide investors to expect Klarna’s initial public offering to price at $37, the top end of its marketing range or possibly higher, according to people familiar with the offering.

The robust demand has prompted the banking syndicate to guide investors to expect Klarna’s initial public offering to price at $37, the top end of its marketing range or possibly higher, according to people familiar with the offering.

headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push
summary: Pittsburgh’s PNC Financial Services Group said Monday it reached an agreement to acquire Colorado lender FirstBank for $4.1 billion, moving one of the largest regional banks in the US one step closer to becoming a coast-to-coast brand.

raw.headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push
raw.summary: Pittsburgh’s PNC Financial Services Group said Monday it reached an agreement to acquire Colorado lender FirstBank for $4.1 billion, moving one of the largest regional banks in the US one step closer to becoming a coast-to-coast brand.

headline: PNC to Acquire Colorado-Based Regional Bank in $4.1 Billion Deal
summary: The agreement helps Pittsburgh-based PNC gain ground in the West and cement its status as a national competitor.

raw.headline: PNC to Acquire Colorado-Based Regional Bank in $4.1 Billion Deal

headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
summary: Klarna's IPO is unattractive; its $13-14B valuation is far too expensive. Despite revenue growth, Klarna remains unprofitable and faces intense competition.

raw.headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
